known_issues: Clicking the "monthly" tab causes the screen to go blank.

existing_features.title: Fix the runtime error that causes the app to render a blank screen when the user clicks the "Monthly" tab in the Dashboard.

Harden the Monthly Transactions UI against common data-shape issues so it cannot crash during filtering/searching (e.g., missing/empty description values, unexpected transactionType values) and instead continues rendering with safe fallbacks.

projectName: Fix blank screen when clicking the Monthly tab
